ComicInfo.Summary: Blue Part Two: She-Hulk and an old friend, Kevin Trench (formerly Nightwatch) are beset by a flock of demons, and their battle ends up causing Jennifer's office rent to be raised. Angie returns from South Dakota with information on the mysterious lawsuit, but Jennifer has decided to drop the investigation (which may not have been a conscious decision).
